title: Papyrus

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Prepare a puzzle.
- Place a puzzle at another player's house

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can only have one puzzle at a time.
- Puzzles last until someone visits your target.
- You learn everyone who activates your puzzles.
- Visitors with the intent to kill your target will be confused by your puzzles, and will be roleblocked.

desc:
Post 1124
*I WILL BE THE ONE I **MUST** BE THE ONE!*
